name: Leonardo DiCaprio
description: American actor and producer known for his versatile roles and collaborations with renowned directors.

content.title: Biography
content.body: **Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio** was born on November 11, 1974, in Los Angeles, California, USA. He began his career in the late 1980s by appearing in television commercials and quickly transitioned to television series.

content.title: Career
content.body: DiCaprio gained recognition for his roles in movies such as *What's Eating Gilbert Grape* (1993), *Romeo + Juliet* (1996), and *Titanic* (1997). His collaboration with director Martin Scorsese resulted in several critically acclaimed films, including *Gangs of New York* (2002), *The Aviator* (2004), *Shutter Island* (2010), *The Departed* (2006), and *The Wolf of Wall Street* (2013). DiCaprio won his first Academy Award for Best Actor for his performance in *The Revenant* (2015).

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Leonardo DiCaprio has frequently collaborated with notable directors such as Martin Scorsese and Christopher Nolan. He has also worked with actors such as Kate Winslet and Matt Damon, among others.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: DiCaprio is celebrated for his contributions to film and environmental activism. He has been nominated for numerous awards and has won several, including an Academy Award, a BAFTA, and a Golden Globe.
